about_the_game:
The Perfect Bowl is an anime inspired cozy Ramen bowl customizer and interactive fiction with Visual Novel elements. Step into the shoes of Ramen Chef, Jimami, as he tries to help make life a little better for others with the art of Ramen. You get to personalize a Ramen bowl just for your customers and what you choose to add to their ramen bowl impacts the outcome of your customers lives. Gently guide your customers with your Ramen and watch their stories unfold.



Every Kind Of Ramen Is Accepted Here!
Your stall is like an omakase (lit. "I'll leave it up to you" in Japanese") but for Ramen. Your customers are entrusting you with providing the right bowl at the right time. Influence their narratives with the types of ingredients you choose to add and watch their story unfold before your eyes.



You got to be a little mad to be staying in Xibalba!
Xibalba is a cold and harsh place. Its takes a special kind of someone to decide to be here and lucky for you, you get to meet some of them! Get to know your strange but lovable customers and their lives on Xibalba.
Who knows, they might become your friends or even better...regulars.



Sometimes you just need to look at something nice!
This games look and feel is highly inspired by the cozy feeling you get when looking at anime food. I wanted to be able to recreate that emotion in an interactive form where you get to create the heart-warming bowl of Ramen of your dreams.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640; Radeon HD 7750; Intel HD Graphics 515
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo

short_description: Uncover the stories of your customers with a nice warm bowl of personalized Ramen in this cozy interactive fiction. Travel around Xibalba, a harsh and frigid planet, to meet new people, catch up with old friends, and guide them along their lives depending on the ingredients you choose to add.
